title: Vexview装上后，进入服务器客户端崩溃
author: Siopen1
txt_content:
服务端：1.14.4 paper

服务端插件：VexView2.5


客户端：fabric-loader-0.7.3+build.176-1.14.4


客户端mod：VexView_FabricMOD_1.14+



客户端装上mod后，进入服务器后客户端直接直接崩溃，服务器后台未报错。



FATAL ERROR in native method: Thread[pool-2-thread-1,5,main]: No context is current or a function that is not available in the current context was called. The JVM will abort execution.
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.GL30C.nglGenFramebuffers(Native Method)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.GL30C.glGenFramebuffers(GL30C.java:1700)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.GL30.glGenFramebuffers(GL30.java:1705)
        at com.mojang.blaze3d.platform.GLX.glGenFramebuffers(GLX.java:1032)
        at net.minecraft.class_276.method_1231(class_276.java:99)
        at net.minecraft.class_276.method_1234(class_276.java:58)
        at net.minecraft.class_276.<init>(class_276.java:44)
        at net.minecraft.class_279.method_1261(class_279.java:254)
        at net.minecraft.class_279.method_1265(class_279.java:109)
        at net.minecraft.class_279.method_1256(class_279.java:73)
        at net.minecraft.class_279.<init>(class_279.java:58)
        at net.minecraft.class_757.method_3168(class_757.java:280)
        at net.minecraft.class_757.invokeLoadShader(class_757.java)
        at com.tterrag.blur.Blur.onScreenChange(Blur.java:118)
        at net.minecraft.class_310.handler$zzj000$onScreenOpen(class_310.java:2982)
        at net.minecraft.class_310.method_1507(class_310.java:821)
        at lk.vexview.m.c.IIIIiIIIiI.pcdlk(lc:11)
        at lk.vexview.m.c.IIIIiIIIiI$$Lambda$2434/1450954809.run(Unknown Source)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1149)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:624)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:748)
AL lib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 1 device not closed

replies.txt_content:
xiao_yu_g 发表于 2020-1-6 11:53
可以尝试讲paper换为spigot。两者基本兼容.我1.12.2spigot无任何异常。还有问题请回复。 ...
我用的就是paperspigot，1.14.4的版本

replies.txt_content: 删除VV文件夹重新生成  一般是配置错误导致

replies.author: Siopen1
replies.txt_content:
C5bb 发表于 2020-1-6 21:20
删除VV文件夹重新生成  一般是配置错误导致
这个方法没有用。

replies.author: Siopen1
replies.txt_content:
粘兽 发表于 2020-1-6 12:54
有改过VexView的配置文件? (除eula)
只改过eula
